variable.comment: The total distance run so far, in pixels.
variable.name: TotalScore

variable.comment: Counts up to 'NextBlock', at which point a new block is created.
variable.name: CurrentDistance

variable.comment: Probability to crea an Pizza Slice
variable.name: PizzaChances

variable.comment: How often the scrolling speed increases
variable.name: IntervalSecs

variable.comment: Set to 1 if level completed successfully
variable.name: Success

variable.comment: Increase the platform width to help the children
variable.name: ChildrenHelp

variable.comment: The distance after which to create the next block.
variable.name: NextBlock

sub-events.comment: Here a create a JUMP powerup
Here I create a Pizza slice
Here I want to create an americana (and the foot soldiers)
Destroy blocks that go off the left of the screen so they don't keep taking up memory or CPU.
